title: Why are people so racist? Why are they using genetics to make racist claims? This is rather a rhetorical question to remind people racism is a term used in pseudoscience. - Quora

response.answer_text: People aren’t “so racist.” It appears to be a focus of yours, so it might seem that way to you. People who are living their lives and have goals and dreams don’t even think about race. If you watch a lot of TV, you will get a different idea, but TV has almost nothing to do with real life. Get out and talk with people, and you will almost never hear a word about race.

I have asked this same question since the bogus and racist claim of White Privilege started. Personally, find any and all forms of racism as offensive, but many times today racism is a term used to fight the truth, have to be careful this is not the case when dealing with some facts.
